text: Penicillium pinophilum is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which was isolated from a radio set in Papua New Guinea.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Penicillium pinophilum produces 3-O-methylfunicone and mycophenolic acid == Further reading == * * * * * * * * * * * * == References == pinophilum Category:Fungi described in 1910
title: Penicillium pinophilum
